name: Project Zero 2: Wii Edition
description:
Project Zero 2: Wii Edition is an action-adventure game developed by KOEI TECMO GAMES CO. It came out on 28-06-2012. Nintendo published the game. On review aggregator Metacritic, Project Zero 2: Wii Edition has a score of 77. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Project Zero 2: Wii Edition is available on Wii.
It was produced by Keisuke Kikuchi, Kozo Makino, Toru Osawa and Toshiharu Izuno. It was directed by Makoto Shibata.
